user_query: Write a data processing script that analyzes CSV files and generates statistical reports
description: Create a Python script that reads CSV files, computes basic statistics, and outputs reports in multiple formats.

requirements.description: Script accepts CSV file path as input argument
Computes mean, median, std dev for numeric columns
Generates value counts for categorical columns
Outputs report as JSON or Markdown based on flag
Handles missing values gracefully with warnings

preferences.name: library
preferences.rationale: Standard for data analysis in Python
